attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Born and raised in England from 1935 to 2004 when we moved 100 yards into North Wales. National Service in the Royal Air Force, reached Sub Officer in the Fire Brigade 11 years. 19 years as a bus driver (Crosville and First Bus.) Our Welsh issued bus passes were refused as no use in England by Western Greyhound, treated as inferior beings and made to pay full fare
On holiday in cornwall this year.
As a UK citizen why are regional passes not accepted by all operators?
This is a reduction of my personal rights for free travel. Thank you for your attention.
I feel that this should be given high prority.
